mapper.select: select s.item_value as "value",s.item_text as "text", s.item_color as "color" from sys_dict_item s where dict_id = (select id from sys_dict where dict_code = #{code}) and s.status = 1 order by s.sort_order asc, s.create_time DESC;
select id as "value",depart_name as "text" from sys_depart where del_flag = '0'
select username as "value",realname as "text" from sys_user where del_flag = '0'
